results.title: Senior Marketing & Communications Manager
results.description:
A career at constellr is for those who are seeking the extraordinary. We are operating in the new space and agri-tech sectors, combining engineering, Earth Observation and agronomy to address one of the biggest challenges of our time: how to ensure global food security.

We are a fast-growing team of more than a dozen highly motivated engineers, scientists, and business professionals with a shared vision to rebase decision making in tomorrow‚Äôs smart farming industry. ConstellR has offices in the European capital, Brussels, situated between the attractive Etterbeek and Watermael districts and in beautiful Freiburg, in south west Germany, bordering the Black Forest and in close proximity to France and Switzerland.

¬†

The role

‚ÄçWe are searching for an analytical, creative and highly motivated marketing professional with a track record in delivering successful marketing campaigns and driving growth through effective product marketing and positioning. You will be up to date and enjoy learning the latest digital and product marketing tools whilst being comfortable with developing strategies for marketing high-tech products and services.

You have a passion for building a brand with purpose and developing a motivated, high-performing team who can leverage their expertise to support both brand development and inbound sales. Your role will be instrumental in driving forward the company‚Äôs international growth and positioning, both as a leading earth observation service provider but also a top place for employees to thrive and develop.

  • Research, design and deliver a product marketing strategy and plan (digital, direct, offline etc.) to support constellr‚Äôs growth and ongoing positioning in the market. You will be instrumental in designing and delivering innovative, successful campaigns.
  • Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders across the business, including in product and commercial to specific marketing objectives across different channels to ensure our marketing is well-aligned with our sales strategy.
  • Drive constellr‚Äôs employer branding strategy to help refine our product and team positioning and messaging as well as support in the standardization of communications and media materials.
  • Implement lean yet consistent and effective marketing performance, tracking and reporting processes to ensure continuous oversight, optimisation and growth.
  • Manage a network of agency partners to develop integrated materials and campaigns (briefing, providing strategic feedback, driving delivery, managing budgets and timelines).
  • Undertake audits of the market to provide competitive insight, and continually review and refresh communication strategies to ensure we stay relevant to customers and strengthen our brand equity.
  • Support in the development of content for our key social media channels as well as the company blog, media and other creative materials.
  • Ownership and optimisation of the constellr website including landing pages, SEO and other relevant content and customer engagement elements.

Your skills & experience

  • Marketing experience in an agency or in-house for a high-tech company; strong experience of technical content writing, channel and campaign management.
  • Experience of developing and running B2B marketing campaigns in European and overseas markets.
  • A long-term motivation for developing a purpose-driven global brand, which helps drive both commercial and team growth.
  • A deep understanding of digital marketing tools, products and services and a strong understanding of the use and value of marketing technology, automation and analytics.
  • A deeply collaborative person who can partner with, learn from and coach peers and junior team members. Able to engage at all levels of the organization and to represent the company externally-
  • Excellent written and spoken English
  • Graphic design and other relevant marketing software experience a massive plus however not essential.
  • The ability to work autonomously and analytically and be results-oriented
  • High discipline in view of the mission ahead.

What we offer you

  • Be part of a fast-growing, multidisciplinary and diverse team with a strong desire to leverage change
  • Autonomy to set and deliver against your own goals, develop new skills and capabilities and lead others to do the same
  • Directly influence your contribution to achieving several of the UN's sustainable development goals, including Zero Hunger, Clean Water, No Poverty and Climate Action
  • Contribute to bringing the world‚Äôs first commercial infrared constellation into orbit and enabling an entirely novel set of smart farming capabilities, as part of our mission to build a new biophysical atlas, driving an unprecedented understanding of our planet and its resources.
  • A competitive salary & benefits package and for some roles a remote or hybrid model. We encourage you to spend at least some time in Freiburg or Brussels with the team to bond and work on special projects.

results.title: Demand Generation Lead
results.description:
About the Opportunity
Settle is on a mission to change the way that businesses pay other businesses. Since the company‚Äôs inception in 2019, we‚Äôve been building a cashflow management platform that allows founders and small business owners to more easily manage their company‚Äôs financial health with a mix of accounts payable and flexible financing tools. We already work with some amazing brands that you probably know and love, like Starface, Ghia, and Italic.

We‚Äôre growing quickly and looking to expand our small-but-mighty marketing team from two to three. This role will offer an exciting hands-on opportunity for a builder to lay the foundation for, and fuel our growth with digital campaigns of all types, from email to PPC and more. You‚Äôll help deploy cross-channel campaigns in conjunction with our sales team to maximize lead generation, upsells, and ultimately conversions. As the third member of the marketing team, you‚Äôll have a unique chance to drive the long-term direction of the org and plenty of opportunity for personal career growth as well.

How You‚Äôll Make an Impact
- Strategize, conceptualize, and execute campaigns across digital channels
- Develop marketing hypotheses and test assumptions with quantitative analysis
- Drive measurable impact to the business through growing pipeline
- Collaborate with Product Marketing and Customer Success to automate and optimize marketing flows
- Partner closely with Sales to develop alignment needed to set the business up to hit growth targets
- Optimize targeted campaigns to drive results within distinct customer segments
- Source and manage external contractors and agencies to augment marketing efforts when needed
- Source, optimize, and implement appropriate marketing tools to deliver positive ROI to the business

What Sets You Apart
- 5+ years experience in a B2B marketing role
- Previous experience working closely with a sales org to define handoff criteria and set them up for success converting leads
- Previous experience building and executing email marketing (and drip) campaigns
- Broad experience with top of funnel ‚Äî¬†you‚Äôre comfortable with a variety of digital mediums, from email to SEO to paid search/social and beyond. You don‚Äôt need to be an expert in everything but you will have at least dabbled across channels
- Experience building and running paid digital ads on platforms like Google and LinkedIn.
- Fluent in Google Analytics (or other analytics platforms) and marketing attribution
- Prior experience with building out at least one marketing system in a previous role, and opinions about tooling/marketing stack
- Desire and ability to take calculated risks
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Great at identifying gaps and asking questions to find a solution (rather than waiting for a solution to fall into your lap)
Bonuses:
- A personal interest in DTC/CPG/Ecomm industry or fintech, or both
- Experience managing social media accounts for a brand/business
- Experience building budgets for omnichannel campaigns
- Comfortable with Salesforce
- Previous experience managing a team as well as agencies and/or freelancers

Compensation
This role has an annual starting salary range of $125,000 - $140,000 + equity + benefits.¬†Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to your individual skills and experience.

Who We Are
Settle is a FinTech company on a mission to help businesses thrive by taking the worry out of cash flow management. We‚Äôre building software making it super easy for finance teams to track, pay, and reconcile invoices. We pair that with lending products to offer our customers the power and flexibility to choose who, when, and how to pay their customers.

Our small but growing team was founded in San Francisco along with an engineering hub in Lviv, Ukraine. We‚Äôre building a fully distributed team and support you working from wherever you are. We're well funded (Series-B) with backing by Ribbit, Stripes, Kleiner Perkins, Founder‚Äôs Fund, SciFi Ventures, and others. Our benefits are competitive, our time off is flexible, and our compensation packages include equity.

Check out this Techcrunch article and Kleiner blog post.

Our Commitment to You
At Settle we know that cultivating diversity and fostering an inclusive work environment is critical to our impact and success. We create an environment where no individual is advantaged or disadvantaged because of their background. We offer equal opportunity employment regardless of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability status, age, marital status, or protected veteran status.

With a commitment to maintaining a bias-free environment in which harassment is prohibited, we respect cultural diversity and comply with the laws of the places in which we operate. We expect our business partners, suppliers, clients, and all of our team members to uphold these commitments.
